Class STRegister

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.STRegister
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ST25DV02KWRegisterPwmCtrlSecurityAttribute, ST25DV02KWRegisterPwmRfConfiguration, ST25DVRegisterEh, ST25DVRegisterEndAi, ST25DVRegisterGpo, ST25DVRegisterITTime, ST25DVRegisterLockCfg, ST25DVRegisterMailboxWatchdog, ST25DVRegisterMbMode, ST25DVRegisterRfAiSS, ST25DVRegisterRfMgt, ST25TVRegisterArea1SecurityAttribute, ST25TVRegisterArea2SecurityAttribute, ST25TVRegisterCounterConfiguration, ST25TVRegisterCounterValue, ST25TVRegisterEasSecurityActivation, ST25TVRegisterKeyId, ST25TVRegisterLockConfiguration, ST25TVRegisterTamperConfiguration, STDynamicRegister

    public class STRegister
extends java.lang.Object
implements CacheInterface
    Defines methods to handle registers of STMicroelectronics's tags

        registerAddress - this register address
        registerName - this register name
        registerContentDescription - this register description
        registerAccessRights - this register access rights
        registerDataSize - this register size

      • getRegisterValue

        public int getRegisterValue()
                     throws STException
        Generic function to get register value. The value is returned as an int so that this generic function can work for every kind of registers (8 bits, 16 bits or even more)
        Returns:
        register value
        Throws:
        STException

      • setRegisterValue

        public void setRegisterValue(int value)
                      throws STException
        Generic function to write a register value. The value is passed as an int so that this generic function can work for every kind of registers (8 bits, 16 bits or even more)
        Parameters:
        value - register value
        Throws:
        STException
